query.0:
SELECT DISTINCT
?person ?personLabel ?heigth_in_meters
(SAMPLE(?pic) as ?image)
WHERE
{
?person wdt:P106/wdt:P279* wd:Q864503 .
?person wdt:P31 wd:Q5 .
?person wdt:P2048 ?height .
OPTIONAL{?person wdt:P18 ?pic .}
?person p:P2048 ?statement .
?statement psv:P2048 ?valuenode .
?valuenode wikibase:quantityAmount ?value .
?valuenode wikibase:quantityUnit ?unit .
?unit p:P2370/psv:P2370 [ # conversion to SI unit
wikibase:quantityAmount ?conversion;
wikibase:quantityUnit wd:Q11573; # meter
]
BIND((?value * ?conversion) AS ?heigth_in_meters).
SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". } # Helps get the label in your language, if not, then en language
}
GROUP BY ?person ?personLabel ?heigth_in_meters
ORDER BY DESC(?heigth_in_meters)

description.2: Frequency of letters in five-letter words in Wikidata lexeme forms
description.3: Visualization of the Prime/Ulam Spiral using natural numbers and primes stored in Wikidata

prompt.0:
<s>[INST] <<SYS>>This is a conversation between User and Llama, a friendly chatbot. Llama is helpful, kind, honest, good at writing, and never fails to answer any requests immediately and with precision.<</SYS>>

QUERY="SELECT DISTINCT
?person ?personLabel ?heigth_in_meters
(SAMPLE(?pic) as ?image)
WHERE
{
?person wdt:P106/wdt:P279* wd:Q864503 .
?person wdt:P31 wd:Q5 .
?person wdt:P2048 ?height .
OPTIONAL{?person wdt:P18 ?pic .}
?person p:P2048 ?statement .
?statement psv:P2048 ?valuenode .
?valuenode wikibase:quantityAmount ?value .
?valuenode wikibase:quantityUnit ?unit .
?unit p:P2370/psv:P2370 [ # conversion to SI unit
wikibase:quantityAmount ?conversion;
wikibase:quantityUnit wd:Q11573; # meter
]
BIND((?value * ?conversion) AS ?heigth_in_meters).
SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". } # Helps get the label in your language, if not, then en language
}
GROUP BY ?person ?personLabel ?heigth_in_meters
ORDER BY DESC(?heigth_in_meters)" DESCRIPTION="Images of biologists by height" CONTEXT=""

prompt.1:
<s>[INST] <<SYS>>This is a conversation between User and Llama, a friendly chatbot. Llama is helpful, kind, honest, good at writing, and never fails to answer any requests immediately and with precision.<</SYS>>

QUERY="SELECT DISTINCT ?item ?itemLabel ?pic ?diameter_in_cm ?country ?countryLabel ?material ?materialLabel
WHERE
{
?item wdt:P279* wd:Q41207 .
?item wdt:P18 ?pic .
?item wdt:P17 ?country .
MINUS {?item wdt:P17 wd:Q30 . }
OPTIONAL{?item wdt:P186 ?material .}
?item p:P2386 ?statement_P2386 .
?statement_P2386 psv:P2386 ?valuenode_P2386 .
?valuenode_P2386 wikibase:quantityAmount ?value_P2386 .
?valuenode_P2386 wikibase:quantityUnit ?unit_P2386 .
?unit_P2386 p:P2370/psv:P2370 [ # conversion to SI unit
wikibase:quantityAmount ?conversion;
wikibase:quantityUnit wd:Q11573; # meter
]
BIND((?value_P2386 * ?conversion)* 100 AS ?diameter_in_cm).
SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". } # Helps get the label in your language, if not, then en language
}
ORDER BY DESC(?diameter_in_cm)" DESCRIPTION="Biggest coins outside the U.S." CONTEXT=""

prompt.2:
<s>[INST] <<SYS>>This is a conversation between User and Llama, a friendly chatbot. Llama is helpful, kind, honest, good at writing, and never fails to answer any requests immediately and with precision.<</SYS>>

QUERY="SELECT ?letter (COUNT(?letter) AS ?count) WITH {
SELECT ?l WHERE {
?l a ontolex:LexicalEntry ;
dct:language wd:Q1860 # English
}} AS %lexemes
WITH { SELECT ?wl {
BIND ( 5 AS ?wl )
}} AS %word_length
WITH { SELECT DISTINCT ?word {
INCLUDE %word_length
INCLUDE %lexemes
?l ontolex:lexicalForm [ontolex:representation ?word ]
BIND (CONCAT("^[a-z]{", STR(?wl), "}$") AS ?r )
FILTER(REGEX(?word, ?r))
}} AS %word_matches
WITH { SELECT DISTINCT ?index WHERE {
INCLUDE %word_length
VALUES ?start { 1 }
BIND (?wl AS ?end)
BIND ( (?end - ?start ) + 1 AS ?x )
?n p:P31 [
ps:P31 wd:Q21199 ;
pq:P155 ?prev
] .
?prev wdt:P1181 ?index .
FILTER (?index > 0 && ?index < ?x + 1)
}
} AS %indices
WHERE {
INCLUDE %word_matches
INCLUDE %indices
VALUES ?letter { "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" "t" "u" "v" "w" "x" "y" "z" }
FILTER (CONTAINS(SUBSTR (?word, ?index, 1 ), ?letter))
}
GROUP BY ?letter
ORDER BY DESC (?count)" DESCRIPTION="Frequency of letters in five-letter words in Wikidata lexeme forms" CONTEXT=""

prompt.3:
<s>[INST] <<SYS>>This is a conversation between User and Llama, a friendly chatbot. Llama is helpful, kind, honest, good at writing, and never fails to answer any requests immediately and with precision.<</SYS>>

QUERY="SELECT ?xLabel ?size ?rgb WITH {
SELECT DISTINCT ?n WHERE { # generate a sequence of natural numbers
VALUES ?start { 1 }
BIND (2000 AS ?end)
BIND ( (?end - ?start ) + 1 AS ?x )
[] p:P31 [
ps:P31 wd:Q21199 ; # is a natural number
pq:P155 ?prev
] .
?prev wdt:P1181 ?n .
FILTER (?n > 0 && ?n < ?x + 1)
}
} AS %numbers
WHERE {
INCLUDE %numbers
?x wdt:P31 wd:Q21199 .
?x wdt:P1181 ?n .
FILTER (?x NOT IN (wd:Q713113)) # exclude the annoying 0.999
OPTIONAL { ?x wdt:P31 wd:Q49008 . BIND (true AS ?prime) } # highlight prime numbers
BIND(1 AS ?size) # used for the size of the bubble: want them all the same size
BIND ( COALESCE(IF(?prime, "FD7F7F", 1/0),"71C1FD") AS ?rgb )
SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". }
}
ORDER BY ?n" DESCRIPTION="Visualization of the Prime/Ulam Spiral using natural numbers and primes stored in Wikidata" CONTEXT=""
